title: LF Jungler for a 5's team
body:
We are a fun group of players that are looking for a jungler to finish off our team so we can start to climb.
Our team consists of an average rank of gold. I am the lowest at silver and highest at diamond. We need a jungler who is happy to play the engage champions but there always room for the odd assassin.

add me in game, snugglemuffin and leave a comment on this chat. We can do some trial games to see if you like me and the same back

Must have Skype, Hope to hear from you :D

replies.body:
I'd be willing to give it a shot. I'm not a jungle main but I am diamond so I'm probably plenty good enough at it for you.
Add me in game if you're interested.
I'de be down to play a couple of games man and see how it goes. I'll add you in game Phil Collins
